name: Broken quest
description:
Submission for godot wild jam 55

Controls:

WASD - Movement

LMB - Shoot

Scroll wheel - Cycle hotbar

E - Use Consumable

Item guide:

Blue pill (consumable) - Increases sleepiness (blue bar)

Red pill (consumable) - Increases health (red bar)

Carrots - Increases damage

Duct tape - Increases magazine capacity

Grape juice - Increases max health
